content:
The Russian occupation troops again attacked the Kherson Center again on March 5. Due to hostile shelling, a man was injured.

About thisinformsKherson Regional Regional State Administration Oleksandr Proudin on Telegram.

“An hour ago, the central part of the city was under fire. A 52-year-old man was injured. He was injured, back and shoulder injury. The victim in the state of moderate "fast" was taken to the hospital, " - wrote the head of the region.

Due to hostile blows, power lines and a private car were damaged.

Also in the afternoon, occupation troops were hit by an administrative building. The premises were seriously destroyed.

As reported by the Armyinform, the Air Force forcesDestroyedRussian controlled X-59 rocket in Dnipropetrovsk.
title: Russian troops hit Kherson center: 52-year-old man was injured
description: This was reported by the head of the Kherson Regional State Administration Alexander Proudin on Telegram. "An hour ago...
author: Army Inform
